notifications.errorLogin: Error logging in. Please check your credentials.
description: This project is developed as part of the RS School React course and aims to provide a client interface for interacting with RESTful and GraphQL APIs.
maximTasks.task1: Implemented Sign In/Sign Up functionality with client-side validation.
maximTasks.task2: Created the History route to restore previous requests for both REST and GraphQL clients.
maximTasks.task3: Designed the Welcome route logic to manage token expiration and user redirection.
pavelTasks.task1: Developed the GraphiQL client, including query editing and response sections.
pavelTasks.task2: Implemented the documentation explorer for GraphQL requests.
pavelTasks.task3: Added support for managing headers and variables within the GraphQL client.
fedorTasks.task1: Built the RESTful client with full support for query editing and method selection.
fedorTasks.task2: Developed a functional response section for RESTful API interactions.
fedorTasks.task3: Added base64 encoding support for URL and request bodies.
courseInfo: This project is part of the RS School React course, which covers modern React development practices, including routing, client-side state management, and API interactions.
emptyHistoryP1: You haven't executed any requests yet.
emptyHistoryP2: It's empty here. Try those options:
historyDescription: History of your requests will be displayed here.
